Skokie.Riviera Theatre:
The Riviera Theatre is a concert venue located on the north side of Chicago, Illinois.


== About ==

Built in 1917, it was designed by Rapp and Rapp for the Balaban & Katz theatre chain run by A. J. Balaban, his brother Barney Balaban and their partner and brother-in-law, Sam Katz. It is an example of French Renaissance Revival architecture.
